revised_title: Ipswichian/Last Interglacial Mammal Fauna in England
tldr: This study examines the changes in mammal fauna during the Ipswichian/Last Interglacial period in England, focusing on the relationship between climatic and vegetational changes and the fossil record. The research investigates the stratigraphy of important sites and the provenance of the mammal finds, providing insights into the history of the mammal fauna during this period.
